text: athpathkara gath aadarayata wada balawathya parithyaga kala aadaraya!!

adhikaranaya haraha aya manasika waidyawarayaku wetha idiripath kirimata da katayuthu yoda athayi me pilibanda kala wimasimakadi polis parikshaka chaminda edirisuriya mahatha kiweya.sakakara mawa adhikaranayata idiripath kota rimand gatha kerini.niyojya polispathi sarath jayasundara kalaniya kottasa bara jyeshta polis adhikari ke. di. somapala sahakara polis adhikari antan sirikumara yana mahathwarunge adhikshanaya matha kiribathgoda polis sthanadhipathi chaminda edirisuraya athulu kandayamak me pilibanda parikshana meheyawathi.
